## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G06490](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G06490)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtMYB108, BOS1, MYB108</u>
- **Gene Name:** myb domain protein 108, BOTRYTIS-SUSCEPTIBLE1, myb domain protein 108
- **Description:**   myb domain protein 108;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Transcripts:
   -  [AT3G06490.1](https://www.arabidopsis.org/gene?name=AT3G06490.1)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [bos1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Mis-regulated cell death development.
   - [bos1 era1-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Larger lesion sizes after Botrytis infection as compared to era1-2. Spontaneous cell death during flowering.
